description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5m in depth, maximum height of 3m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
The use of grey water is to be encouraged on the site for the purposes of irrigation for the landscaping and/or buildings on the site.

The assessment has been based on the original layout of the house that shows a rear outrigger. The proposed extension would extend beyond the side elevation of the outrigger and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) & (ja) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

As of the 01/08/2021 there is a requirement to be accompanied by a Fire Statement for an application that involves two or more dwellings - Please see statement on the form found in the following weblink https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/planning-application-forms-templates-for-local-planning-authorities

You are required to complete the 'Determining whether a Development may be CIL Liable Planning Application Additional Information Requirement form'. This form can be downloaded from the planning portal at https://ecab.planningportal.co.uk/uploads/1app/forms/form_1_cil_additional_information.pdf . Please complete and return as soon as possible. If you have confirmed that the development is Cil Liable, please also complete the Assumption of Liability Form at https://www.planningportal.co.uk/info/200136/policy_and_legislation/70/community_infrastructure_levy/5  and return as soon as possible.
